Name: LU 531 - Zoning, Vernon Boulevard Broadway Rezoning, Queens (C 100421 ZMQ)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 100421 ZMQ, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 531).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

Minutes of the Stated Meeting - October 17, 2019

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fmodern\fprq1\fcharset0 Courier;}}
\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca and Moya\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, Cipico Construction Inc., \expndtw-6 filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 9a, changing from an R5 District to an R6B District, changing from an R5 District to an R7X District, and establishing within the proposed R7X District a C1-3 District, which in conjunction with the related actions would facilitate the development of a large-scale general development on the block bounded by Vernon Boulevard and Broadway to the north, 11\super th\nosupersub  Street to the east, 33\super rd\nosupersub  Road to the south and 10\super th\nosupersub  Street to the west in Astoria, Queens Community District 1 (ULURP No. C 100421 ZMQ) (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on September 13, 2019, its decision dated September 11, 2019 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 190151 ZRQ (L.U. No. 532), a zoning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area and C 190386 ZSQ (L.U. No. 533), a special permit pursuant to Section 74-743 of the Zoning Resolution, to permit the distribution of total allowable floor area without regard for zoning lot lines and to modify the minimum base height requirements of Section 23-664;\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on September 18, 2019;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration issued April 22\super nd\nosupersub , 2019 (CEQR No. 12DCP139Q), which includes an (E) designation to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to air quality, noise, and hazardous materials (E-518) (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote ).\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the (E) Designation (E-518) and Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 100421 ZMQ, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission.\par
\pard\ltrpar\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560 The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 9a: \par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\qj 1.\tab changing from an R5 District to an R6B District property bounded by 10\super th\nosupersub  Street, a line 100 feet northeasterly of 33\super rd\nosupersub  Road, 11\super th\nosupersub  Street, and 33\super rd\nosupersub  Road;\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\qj\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\qj\f0 2.\tab changing from an R5 District to an R7X District property bounded by 10\super th\nosupersub  Street, Vernon Boulevard, Broadway, 11\super th\nosupersub  Street and a line 100 feet northeasterly of 33\super rd\nosupersub  Road; and \par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\qj\f0 3.\tab establishing within the proposed R7X District a C1-3 District bounded by 10\super th\nosupersub  Street, Vernon Boulevard, Broadway, 11\super th\nosupersub  Street and a line 100 feet northeasterly of 33\super rd\nosupersub  Road;\par
\pard\ltrpar\f1\par
\f0 as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated April 22, 2019, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-518, Community District 1, Borough of Queens.\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\f0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj Adopted.\par
\par
\tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on October 17, 2019, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
